net.sourceforge.jnlp.security

Class SecurityDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.jnlp.security.SecurityDialog

  • public class SecurityDialog
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for showing security warning dialogs for a wide range of JNLP security issues. Note that the security dialogs should be running in the secure AppContext - this class should not be used directly from an applet or application. See SecurityDialogs for a way to show security dialogs.
